Header: Army Body Builders Champion in Defence Services Games
Content: The final rounds in Body Building, Weight Lifting and Power Lifting Tournament - 2017/2018 of the Defence Services Games (DSG) and the subsequent awarding of trophies to the winners took place at Sri Lanka Navy camp premises in Welisara on Tuesday (26). Representing the Sri Lanka Army Body Building, Weight Lifting and Power Lifting Sports Committee, 9 players emerged prominent and won 5 Gold, 8 Silver and 2 Bronze medals respectively during the tournament to claim overall championship. Army body builders bagged 51 points in the mark table.
